name: ChillPill
description:
*** GAME STILL IN DEVELOPMENT ***

This game will be a glorious walking simulator, with the aim to just relax.

The full release will include:

  • Spotify integration
  • up to 3 different maps (and maybe an editor)
  • Souls-like messaging system
  • up to 10 secrets in each map
  • full control over seasons/time of day
  • photo mode.

Right now the game is very lacking, In the coming update, I will fix character movement and game performance. The current map is not official yet, and there is no sound or secrets scattered across the map yet.

Feel free to download, try to walk around, and give feedback and support, like:

  • did you have performance issues?
  • did the player controls feel right to you?
  • did the map feel empty (for a forest)?
  • do you have suggestions?
